publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-810 Henry McLeish: Learning and Skills Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the regulation-making powers relating to Scotland in respect of learning accounts in the Learning and Skills Bill should be devolved to the Scottish Ministers.

S1M-810 Henry McLeish: Learning and Skills Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the regulation-making powers relating to Scotland in respect of learning accounts in the Learning and Skills Bill should be devolved to the Scottish Ministers.
